description: Few organisations have taken a bigger hit from coronavirus than the Serbian Orthodox Church
title: Serbia coronavirus: The Church losing its leaders to the pandemic
title_page: Serbia coronavirus: The Church losing its leaders to the pandemic - BBC News
maintext: Regardless of the decimation of its leadership, the Orthodox Church remains central to many people's lives. And while schools in Serbia have mostly moved online because of the epidemic, communion is still performed in person, often in breach of the ban on gatherings of more than five people.
